name: The Berndt Group
description:
Leading Sitecore Partner:  Digital Strategy, UX, Large Site Implementation, Personalization, and CMS Usability.
TBG has been a national expert in CMS best practices and holistic web development for large sites, heavily focused on Sitecore CMS implementation. The firm provides roadmap-to-completion services and supports many significant sites, with banner clients such as Valspar, Stanley Black & Decker, M&T Bank, Penn Medicine, Johns Hopkins, UPMC, Children’s National Medical Center, Loyola University, the Office of Government Ethics, and many others.
We are experts in the following: 1) help large organizations plan operationally and strategically for large website projects. 2) ensure that those projects have the highest quality and consistency of user experience (UX) and content strategy, with a focus on fully Responsive Web Design for tablet and mobile, and 3) teach web operations and marketers how to take full advantage of the advanced content personalization, tracking, and mobile device features available with the new technology—all with a major focus on sustainability.
With over 400+ significant projects launched and 50+ active clients, TBG is highly active in the areas of healthcare, finance, direct-to-consumer, nonprofits, professional associations, higher education, and government website development.
